Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْكَلَامِ مَا زَانَهُ حُسْنُ النِّظَامِ وَفَهِمَهُ الْخَاصُّ وَالْعَامُّ
enWisdom: The best speech is that which is adorned by good arrangement and understood by [both] the elite and the general public

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْمَقَالِ مَا صَدَّقَهُ حُسْنُ الْفِعَالِ
enWisdom: The best of speech is that which is affirmed by good actions

Wisdom: أَبْلَغُ الْبَلَاغَةِ مَا سَهُلَ فِي الصَّوَابِ مَجَازُهُ وَحَسُنَ [و أحسن‏] إِيجَازُهُ
enWisdom: The most conveying eloquent speech is that which is easily passed on [and understood] correctly and which is appropriately concise
The best speech is that which is pertinent
The most accurate shot is speech that is prudent

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْكَلَامِ مَا لَا تَمُجُّهُ الْآذَانُ وَلَا يُتْعِبُ فَهْمُهُ الْأَفْهَامَ [الْأَذْهَانَ‏]
enWisdom: The best speech is that which is not dismissed by the ears and is not difficult for the minds to comprehend
Beautiful speech is proof of abundant intelligence

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْكَلَامِ مَا لَا يُمِلُّ وَلَا يُقِلُّ
enWisdom: The best speech is that which is neither boring [because of its length] nor too brief

Wisdom: صَلَاحُ الْإِنْسَانِ فِي حَبْسِ اللِّسَانِ وَبَذْلِ الْإِحْسَانِ
enWisdom: The uprightness of a human being is in controlling the tongue and doing good deeds

Wisdom: عَوِّدْ لِسَانَكَ حُسْنَ الْكَلَامِ تَأْمَنِ الْمَلَامَ
enWisdom: Accustom your tongue to polite speech and you will remain safe from reproach

Wisdom: كُنْ حَسَنَ الْمَقَالِ جَمِيلَ الْأَفْعَالِ فَإِنَّ مَقَالَ الرَّجُلِ بُرْهَانُ فَضْلِهِ وَفَعَالَهُ عُنْوَانُ عَقْلِهِ
enWisdom: Be good in your speech, beautiful in your actions, for indeed the speech of a person is the evidence of his merit and his action is the symbol of his intellect
The righteous tongue rejects the foolishness of the ignorant

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ كَلَامُهُ كَانَ النُّجْحُ أَمَامَهُ
enWisdom: One whose speech is good, success is in front of him
One whose speech is bad, his censure increases
